title: Epic: RAG v2 Phase 1 - Infrastructure & Core Pipeline
description:
Phase 1 establishes foundational infrastructure for RAG v2:

**Features:**
1.1 RAGv2Settings - Environment-driven configuration in catalog/core/settings.py
1.2 LLM Result Caching - Cache for expansion/rerank results in catalog/store/llm_cache.py  
1.3 Resilient Embedding - Batch-to-single fallback in catalog/embedding/resilient.py
1.4 Resilient Chunking - Token-to-char fallback in catalog/transform/splitter.py
1.5 Embedding Prefix Transform - Nomic-style prefixes in catalog/transform/embedding.py
1.6 V2 Ingestion Pipeline - Combines all transforms in catalog/ingest/pipelines_v2.py

**Dependencies:** None (foundational)
**Tests:** tests/rag_v2/test_transforms.py, test_cache.py, test_ingestion_v2.py

title: Epic: RAG v2 Phase 2 - Search Pipeline
description:
Phase 2 implements core search functionality:

**Features:**
2.1 Query Expansion System - LLM-powered query variants in catalog/search/query_expansion.py
2.2 RRF Postprocessors - TopRankBonus, KeywordChunkSelector, PerDocDedupe, ScoreNormalizer in catalog/search/postprocessors.py
2.3 Weighted RRF Hybrid Retriever - Custom RRF with weights in catalog/search/hybrid_v2.py
2.4 Cached Reranker - Cache wrapper for reranker in catalog/llm/reranker.py
2.5 Snippet Formatting - Line-number citations in catalog/search/formatting.py
2.6 Search Service V2 - Unified orchestrator in catalog/search/service_v2.py

**Dependencies:** Phase 1 (1.1 Settings, 1.2 LLM Cache)
**Tests:** tests/rag_v2/test_query_expansion.py, test_postprocessors.py, test_hybrid_retrieval.py

title: Epic: RAG v2 Phase 3 - MCP & API
description:

title: Epic: RAG v2 Phase 4 - Evaluation & Rollout

title: 1.1 RAGv2Settings - Configuration System
description:
Add RAGv2Settings to catalog/core/settings.py with environment variable support (IDX_RAG_V2__*).

**Config knobs:**
- Chunking: chunk_size=800, chunk_overlap=120, chunk_fallback_enabled, chunk_chars_per_token=4
- Embedding: embed_batch_size=32, embed_fallback_enabled, embed_prefix_query, embed_prefix_doc
- Query expansion: expansion_enabled, expansion_max_lex=3, expansion_max_vec=3, expansion_include_hyde
- RRF fusion: rrf_k=60, rrf_original_weight=2.0, rrf_expansion_weight=1.0, rrf_rank1_bonus=0.05, rrf_rank23_bonus=0.02
- Reranking: rerank_top_n=10, rerank_candidates=40, rerank_cache_enabled
- Caching: cache_ttl_hours=168
- Retrieval: vector_top_k=20, fts_top_k=20, fusion_top_k=30
- Snippets: snippet_max_lines=10, snippet_context_lines=2

**Acceptance:**
- RAGv2Settings class with all config knobs
- Environment variable override support
- Default values match TypeScript QMD system
- Unit tests for settings loading
